hero.subtitle: Precision Engineering for a Rust-Free Future.
hero.tagline: Specializing in industrial cleaning processes, corrosion control, and chemical management to elevate manufacturing quality.

about.headline: Over 10 Years Driving Quality and Efficiency
about.description: I am a dedicated Technical Specialist with a decade of experience focused on achieving zero-defect production standards in automotive and heavy machinery sectors. My expertise lies in designing, implementing, and auditing complex cleanliness processes, specifically **rust prevention** using VCI/HIC technologies, and advanced **chemical management** systems (e.g., coolants, cutting oils, pre-treatment). I translate data-driven insights into actionable process improvements that directly reduce costs and prevent warranty claims.

casestudies.title: 50% Reduction in Corrosion Defects
casestudies.summary: Implemented a multi-stage VCI packaging and process control protocol across 3 supply chain tiers, cutting corrosion-related defects by half in 6 months.

casestudies.title: Coolant Life Extension Project
casestudies.summary: Designed a new monitoring and dosing system for central coolant systems, extending fluid life from 6 to 18 months, saving $150k annually in disposal costs.

particle-counter.title: Selecting the Right Particle Counter for VDA 19.1 Audits
particle-counter.summary: A deep dive into the technical specifications and calibration requirements for particle counting in industrial cleanliness assessments.

projects.name: Global VCI Standard Operating Procedure
projects.description: Authored and deployed a standardized global SOP for Volatile Corrosion Inhibitor (VCI) application, ensuring compliance across five international plants.

projects.name: Machine Fluid Health Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a real-time Power BI dashboard integrating sensor data for key fluid parameters (pH, concentration, conductivity) to enable proactive maintenance.
